thread.title: Come fly with me: Queenstown Airport voted 'world's BEST runway view'
thread.title_full: Come fly with me: Queenstown Airport voted 'world's BEST runway view'

title: Come fly with me: Queenstown Airport voted 'world's BEST runway view'
text: Come fly with me: Queenstown Airport voted 'world's BEST runway view' Come fly with me: Queenstown Airport voted 'world's BEST runway view' QUEENSTOWN Airport flew to top spot after being voted "world's best runway view of 2015". PUBLISHED: 10:01, Tue, Jul 14, 2015 | UPDATED: 10:10, Tue, Jul 14, 2015 Vaughan Brookfield Queenstown Airport was voted as having the best runway view of 2015 The New Zealand airport snatched the most votes following a global poll conducted by private jet booking service PrivateFly. Queenstown beat last years' favourite Nice Cote D'Azur in France, as well as Las Vegas McCarran Airport. One voter commented: "I've flown to many beautiful locations worldwide but nothing even comes close to comparing with the thrill and beauty that stuns you as you come to land at Queenstown." It has always been highly praised by our voters but this year claims the top spot – and deservedly so Adam Twidell, chief executive of PrivateFly Adam Twidell, chief executive of PrivateFly said that Queenstown Airport "deservedly" claimed the top spot this year. "New Zealand's South Island has some of the most jaw-dropping natural scenery available in the world and Queenstown Airport's landing offers the perfect airside introduction." He added: "It has always been highly praised by our voters but this year claims the top spot – and deservedly so." Related articles
